summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5273 for the improvement of the alley in Block 29, Mercer's 2nd Addition, as established by Ordinance No. 56281, being the alley between Prospect Street and Ward Street, from Nob Hill Avenue to 3rd Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 61028, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
